definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: Safeguarding stability is becoming an important task of local government.
sentences.chinese: 维稳越来越成为地方政府的重要任务。

sentences.english: " According to Zhang Jiliang, this is his striving to "holding stability and pioneer" of the holy grail.
sentences.chinese: 据张继良介绍，这是他争当“维稳先锋”的制胜法宝。

sentences.english: Maintaining stability has become a hot topic for Chinese society.
sentences.chinese: 维稳已经成为中国社会的头号大事。

definition: to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
(Tw) to pull sth up/(fig.) to give a boost to/to support
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
to flee from danger/to avoid danger/to minimize risk/(finance) hedge
to fall back/to return to low level after a rise (in water level, price etc)
